mapper.insert: insert into product (id, name, price, product_desc, img) values (seq_cart.nextval, #{productName}, #{productPrice}, #{productDesc}, #{img})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, price, product_desc, img from product where id = #{productId}

select * from (select a.*, rownum AS rnum from (select id as product_id, name as product_name, price as product_price, product_desc as product_desc, img as img from product where 1=1
order by name) a) WHERE rnum between #{paging.firstRow} and #{paging.lastRow}
